text: Adesa bhayoh â€˜â€˜ki nuha (dungabata) tala jharihala, hamro taraphabata santi ra timi ra timro sathaka an'ya sathiharumathi anugraha hunecha! Ra aneka yasta samudaya hunechan jasala'i hamile (sansaraka) anandaharu pradana garnechaum, tara tiniharula'i hamro tarphabata kastadayaka sajaya pugnecha
